text: I prepiralsya s nim yego narod. On skazal: "Neuzheli vy prepirayetes' so mnoy iz-za Allakha, v to vremya kak On vyvel menya na pryamoy put'? YA ne boyus' togo, chto vy pridayete Yemu v sotovarishchi, yesli chego libo ne pozhelayet moy Gospod'. Ob"yemlet moy Gospod' vsyakuyu veshch' znameniyem. Neuzheli zhe vy ne opomnites'
